name: Lewis_Nordine
text:
Lewis Nordine
Lewis Nordine was a childhood friend of Dale Cooper.
Biography
For Christmas 1967, Lewis' father gave him a model airplane. As he flew the airplane, his older brother fired at it with a BB gun until its engine failed, causing it to hit a snow emergency sign.
Nordine later served in the United States Air Force. He was interviewed for the release of Cooper's autobiographical tape collection.
